verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David אַל־ <WH408> not תִּתְחַ֥ר <WH2734> Fret בַּמְּרֵעִ֑ים <WH7489> not thyself because of evildoers אַל־ <WH408> be not תְּ֝קַנֵּ֗א <WH7065> neither be thou envious בְּעֹשֵׂ֥י <WH6213> against the workers עַוְלָֽה׃ <WH5766> of iniquity

כִּ֣י <WH3588> like כֶ֭חָצִיר <WH2682> like the grass מְהֵרָ֣ה <WH4120> For they shall soon יִמָּ֑לוּ <WH5243> be cut down וּכְיֶ֥רֶק <WH3418> as the green דֶּ֝֗שֶׁא <WH1877> herb יִבּוֹלֽוּן׃ <WH5034> and wither

בְּטַ֣ח <WH982> Trust בַּֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> in the LORD וַעֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> and do ט֑וֹב <WH2896> good שְׁכָן־ <WH7931> [so] shalt thou dwell אֶ֝֗רֶץ <WH776> in the land וּרְעֵ֥ה <WH7462> thou shalt be fed אֱמוּנָֽה׃ <WH530> and verily

וְהִתְעַנַּ֥ג <WH6026> Delight עַל־ <WH5921> in יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> thyself also in the LORD וְיִֽתֶּן־ <WH5414> and he shall give לְ֝ךָ֗ מִשְׁאֲלֹ֥ת <WH4862> thee the desires לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH3820> of thine heart

גּ֣וֹל <WH1556> Commit עַל־ <WH5921> unto יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ <WH1870> thy way וּבְטַ֥ח <WH982> trust עָ֝לָ֗יו <WH5921> and וְה֣וּא <WH1931> and He יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> also in him and he shall bring [it] to pass
וְהוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> And he shall bring forth כָא֣וֹר <WH216> as the light צִדְקֶ֑ךָ <WH6664> thy righteousness וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטֶ֗ךָ <WH4941> and thy judgment כַּֽצָּהֳרָֽיִם׃ <WH6672> as the noonday

דּ֤וֹם ׀ <WH1826> Rest לַיהוָה֮ <WH3068> in the LORD וְהִתְח֪וֹלֵ֫ל <WH2342> and wait patiently ל֥וֹ אַל־ <WH408> not תִּ֭תְחַר <WH2734> for him fret בְּמַצְלִ֣יחַ <WH6743> not thyself because of him who prospereth דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> in his way בְּ֝אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> because of the man עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> to pass מְזִמּֽוֹת׃ <WH4209> wicked devices

הֶ֣רֶף <WH7503> Cease מֵ֭אַף <WH639> from anger וַעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> and forsake חֵמָ֑ה <WH2534> wrath אַל־ <WH408> not תִּ֝תְחַ֗ר <WH2734> fret אַךְ־ <WH389> not thyself in any wise לְהָרֵֽעַ׃ <WH7489> to do evil

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For מְ֭רֵעִים <WH7489> For evildoers יִכָּרֵת֑וּן <WH3772> shall be cut off וְקֹוֵ֥י <WH6960> but those that wait יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> upon the LORD הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> they יִֽירְשׁוּ־ <WH3423> they shall inherit אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

וְע֣וֹד <WH5750> Yet מְ֭עַט <WH4592> For yet a little while וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> will be no רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> and the wicked וְהִתְבּוֹנַ֖נְתָּ <WH995> [shall] not [be] yea thou shalt diligently consider עַל־ <WH5921> for מְקוֹמ֣וֹ <WH4725> his place וְאֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH369> more

וַעֲנָוִ֥ים <WH6035> But the meek יִֽירְשׁוּ־ <WH3423> shall inherit אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְ֝הִתְעַנְּג֗וּ <WH6026> and shall delight עַל־ <WH5921> in רֹ֥ב <WH7230> themselves in the abundance שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> of peace
זֹמֵ֣ם <WH2161> plotteth רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> The wicked לַצַּדִּ֑יק <WH6662> against the just וְחֹרֵ֖ק <WH2786> and gnasheth עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> with שִׁנָּֽיו׃ <WH8127> upon him with his teeth
אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> The Lord יִשְׂחַק־ <WH7832> shall laugh ל֑וֹ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רָ֝אָ֗ה <WH7200> at him for he seeth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָבֹ֥א <WH935> is coming יוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH3117> that his day

חֶ֤רֶב ׀ <WH2719> the sword פָּֽתְח֣וּ <WH6605> have drawn out רְשָׁעִים֮ <WH7563> The wicked וְדָרְכ֪וּ <WH1869> and have bent קַ֫שְׁתָּ֥ם <WH7198> their bow לְ֭הַפִּיל <WH5307> to cast down עָנִ֣י <WH6041> the poor וְאֶבְי֑וֹן <WH34> and needy לִ֝טְב֗וֹחַ <WH2873> [and] to slay יִשְׁרֵי־ <WH3477> such as be of upright דָֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> conversation
חַ֭רְבָּם <WH2719> Their sword תָּב֣וֹא <WH935> shall enter בְלִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> into their own heart וְ֝קַשְּׁתוֹתָ֗ם <WH7198> and their bows תִּשָּׁבַֽרְנָה׃ <WH7665> shall be broken
טוֹב־ <WH2896> hath [is] better מְ֭עַט <WH4592> A little לַצַּדִּ֑יק <WH6662> that a righteous man מֵ֝הֲמ֗וֹן <WH1995> than the riches רְשָׁעִ֥ים <WH7563> wicked רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> of many

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For זְרוֹע֣וֹת <WH2220> For the arms רְ֭שָׁעִים <WH7563> of the wicked תִּשָּׁבַ֑רְנָה <WH7665> shall be broken וְסוֹמֵ֖ךְ <WH5564> upholdeth צַדִּיקִ֣ים <WH6662> the righteous יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> but the LORD

יוֹדֵ֣עַ <WH3045> knoweth יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> the days תְמִימִ֑ם <WH8549> of the upright וְ֝נַחֲלָתָ֗ם <WH5159> and their inheritance לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> shall be for ever תִּהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יֵ֭בֹשׁוּ <WH954> They shall not be ashamed בְּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> time רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> in the evil וּבִימֵ֖י <WH3117> and in the days רְעָב֣וֹן <WH7459> of famine יִשְׂבָּֽעוּ׃ <WH7646> they shall be satisfied

כִּ֤י <WH3588> But רְשָׁעִ֨ים ׀ <WH7563> But the wicked יֹאבֵ֗דוּ <WH6> shall perish וְאֹיְבֵ֣י <WH341> and the enemies יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּיקַ֣ר <WH3368> [shall be] as the fat כָּרִ֑ים <WH3733> of lambs כָּל֖וּ <WH3615> they shall consume בֶעָשָׁ֣ן <WH6227> into smoke כָּֽלוּ׃ <WH3615> shall they consume away

לֹוֶ֣ה <WH3867> borroweth רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> The wicked וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not יְשַׁלֵּ֑ם <WH7999> and payeth not again וְ֝צַדִּ֗יק <WH6662> but the righteous חוֹנֵ֥ן <WH2603> sheweth mercy וְנוֹתֵֽן׃ <WH5414> and giveth

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מְ֭בֹרָכָיו <WH1288> For [such as be] blessed יִ֣ירְשׁוּ <WH3423> of him shall inherit אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the earth וּ֝מְקֻלָּלָ֗יו <WH7043> and [they that be] cursed יִכָּרֵֽתוּ׃ <WH3772> of him shall be cut off
מֵ֭יְהוָה <WH3068> by the LORD מִֽצְעֲדֵי־ <WH4703> The steps גֶ֥בֶר <WH1397> of a [good] man כּוֹנָ֗נוּ <WH3559> are ordered וְדַרְכּ֥וֹ <WH1870> in his way יֶחְפָּֽץ׃ <WH2654> and he delighteth

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יִפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> Though he fall לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יוּטָ֑ל <WH2904> he shall not be utterly cast down כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> for the LORD סוֹמֵ֥ךְ <WH5564> upholdeth יָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> [him with] his hand

נַ֤עַר ׀ <WH5288> I have been young הָיִ֗יתִי <WH1961> have been גַּם־ <WH1571> and now זָ֫קַ֥נְתִּי <WH2204> and [now] am old וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> have not רָ֭אִיתִי <WH7200> yet have I not seen צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> the righteous נֶעֱזָ֑ב <WH5800> forsaken וְ֝זַרְע֗וֹ <WH2233> nor his seed מְבַקֶּשׁ־ <WH1245> begging לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> bread
כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַ֭יּוֹם <WH3117> [He is] ever חוֹנֵ֣ן <WH2603> merciful וּמַלְוֶ֑ה <WH3867> and lendeth וְ֝זַרְע֗וֹ <WH2233> and his seed לִבְרָכָֽה׃ <WH1293> [is] blessed
ס֣וּר <WH5493> Depart מֵ֭רָע <WH7451> from evil וַעֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> and do ט֗וֹב <WH2896> good וּשְׁכֹ֥ן <WH7931> and dwell לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for evermore

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> For the LORD אֹ֘הֵ֤ב <WH157> loveth מִשְׁפָּ֗ט <WH4941> judgment וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and does not יַעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> and forsaketh אֶת־ <WH853> חֲ֭סִידָיו <WH2623> not his saints לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> for ever נִשְׁמָ֑רוּ <WH8104> they are preserved וְזֶ֖רַע <WH2233> but the seed רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked נִכְרָֽת׃ <WH3772> shall be cut off
צַדִּיקִ֥ים <WH6662> The righteous יִֽירְשׁוּ־ <WH3423> shall inherit אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land וְיִשְׁכְּנ֖וּ <WH7931> and dwell לָעַ֣ד <WH5703> therein for ever עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> and

פִּֽי־ <WH6310> The mouth צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> of the righteous יֶהְגֶּ֣ה <WH1897> speaketh חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> wisdom וּ֝לְשׁוֹנ֗וֹ <WH3956> and his tongue תְּדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> talketh מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> of judgment
תּוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> The law אֱלֹהָ֣יו <WH430> of his God בְּלִבּ֑וֹ <WH3820> [is] in his heart לֹ֖א <WH3808> not תִמְעַ֣ד <WH4571> shall slide אֲשֻׁרָֽיו׃ <WH838> none of his steps
צוֹפֶ֣ה <WH6822> watcheth רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> The wicked לַצַּדִּ֑יק <WH6662> the righteous וּ֝מְבַקֵּ֗שׁ <WH1245> and seeketh לַהֲמִיתוֹ׃ <WH4191> to slay

יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD לֹא־ <WH3808> will not יַעַזְבֶ֣נּוּ <WH5800> will not leave בְיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> him in his hand וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יַ֝רְשִׁיעֶ֗נּוּ <WH7561> nor condemn בְּהִשָּׁפְטֽוֹ׃ <WH8199> him when he is judged

קַוֵּ֤ה <WH6960> Wait אֶל־ <WH413> for יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> on the LORD וּשְׁמֹ֬ר <WH8104> and keep דַּרְכּ֗וֹ <WH1870> his way וִֽ֭ירוֹמִמְךָ <WH7311> and he shall exalt לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH3423> thee to inherit אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land בְּהִכָּרֵ֖ת <WH3772> are cut off רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> when the wicked תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> thou shalt see
רָ֭אִיתִי <WH7200> I have seen רָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> the wicked עָרִ֑יץ <WH6184> in great power וּ֝מִתְעָרֶ֗ה <WH6168> and spreading כְּאֶזְרָ֥ח <WH249> bay tree רַעֲנָֽן׃ <WH7488> himself like a green

וַ֭יַּֽעֲבֹר <WH5674> Yet he passed away וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and lo אֵינֶ֑נּוּ <WH369> was no וָֽ֝אֲבַקְשֵׁ֗הוּ <WH1245> and lo he [was] not yea I sought וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> could נִמְצָֽא׃ <WH4672> him but he could not be found

שְׁמָר־ <WH8104> Mark תָּ֭ם <WH8535> the perfect וּרְאֵ֣ה <WH7200> [man] and behold יָשָׁ֑ר <WH3477> the upright כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַחֲרִ֖ית <WH319> for the end לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of [that] man שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> [is] peace

וּֽ֭פֹשְׁעִים <WH6586> But the transgressors נִשְׁמְד֣וּ <WH8045> shall be destroyed יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together אַחֲרִ֖ית <WH319> the end רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked נִכְרָֽתָה׃ <WH3772> shall be cut off

וּתְשׁוּעַ֣ת <WH8668> But the salvation צַ֭דִּיקִים <WH6662> of the righteous מֵיְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [is] of the LORD מָֽ֝עוּזָּ֗ם <WH4581> [he is] their strength בְּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> in the time צָרָֽה׃ <WH6869> of trouble

וַֽיַּעְזְרֵ֥ם <WH5826> shall help יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD וַֽיְפַ֫לְּטֵ֥ם <WH6403> them and deliver יְפַלְּטֵ֣ם <WH6403> them he shall deliver מֵ֭רְשָׁעִים <WH7563> them from the wicked וְיוֹשִׁיעֵ֑ם <WH3467> and save כִּי־ <WH3588> Because חָ֥סוּ <WH2620> them because they trust בֽוֹ׃
